newsitem.title: FRANCE: Juppe to announce French tax reforms Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Juppe to announce French tax reforms Thursday.

text.p: French Prime Minister Alain Juppe will announce his plans for tax reform at 1800 GMT on Thursday, his office said in a statement on Wednesday.
"On Thursday September 5 at 2000 (local) Prime Minister Alain Juppe will present to the French people the government's plans for tax reduction," the statement said, without giving further details.

A government source said Juppe would probably present the tax reform plans on television. The government has promised to cut taxes by at least 20 billion francs next year and to lower all taxes over the next five years.
